applicant-details.application-details-intro: Enter the details of the person whose details you want to update. Their details must match the identity document that UK Visas and Immigration holds on record.

identity-number.intro: For security, you must provide us with information from an identity document that UK Visas and Immigration has on {{#values.isApplicant}}your{{/values.isApplicant}}{{^values.isApplicant}}{{values.nameWithPossession}}{{/values.isApplicant}} record.

upload-identity.upload-identity-intro: For security, you must prove {{#isApplicant}}your{{/isApplicant}}{{^isApplicant}}{{values.applicant-full-name}}’s{{/isApplicant}} identity.
upload-identity.upload-identity-instructions: Upload a scanned copy of an acceptable proof of identity document.
upload-identity.upload-identity-requirements: The identity document must not be expired and the scan must be clear and easy to read.

upload-postal-address.upload-postal-intro: For security, you must prove {{#isApplicant}}your{{/isApplicant}}{{^isApplicant}}{{values.applicant-full-name}}’s{{/isApplicant}} address.
upload-postal-address.upload-postal-instructions: Upload a scanned copy of an acceptable proof of address document.
upload-postal-address.upload-postal-requirements: The document must be dated within the last 3 months. The scan must be clear and easy to read.

dependant-details.header: Which dependant would you like to make the same changes to?

check-answers.check-answers-intro: Check these details carefully before continuing. If any of the details are incorrect, change them.

request-submitted.p1: You should keep this reference number safe as you will need it if you contact us about this update.
request-submitted.p2: We have received your new details and have sent a confirmation email to {{values.email}}.
request-submitted.p3: Sometimes we will contact you for more information. If we do not contact you, it will take up to 5 working days to update your details.

legal-representative-details.header: Your legal representative details will be

dependants.label: Which dependant(s) would you like to make the same changes to?

postal-address-details.label: What is your new postal address?

old-address.label: Is {{#values.isApplicant}}your{{/values.isApplicant}} {{^values.isApplicant}}{{values.nameWithPossession}} {{/values.isApplicant}} old home address in the UK?

home-address-details.label: What is your new home address
